# isSharedByCurrentUser

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the item was shared by the current user.

## Declaration

```swift
optional var isSharedByCurrentUser: Bool { get }
```

## Sharing

- **isShared**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item is shared with other users.
- **mostRecentEditorNameComponents**: The most recent editor’s name.
- **ownerNameComponents**: The name of the item’s owner.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item is shared with other users.
items.name: isShared

items.description: The name of the item’s owner.
